column2:
"Don't you feel so adventurous braving a mission
with restrictions like these? This is your chance
to prove yourself to me!"

"Isn't it okay now that you're
not a hack? It should be cake, right?
Do what you can!"

"制限つけての挑戦って
なんだかカッコイイじゃない？
アンタの実力を私に示すいい機会よ！"

"もうへっぽこぴーじゃないんだし
大丈夫でしょ？　余裕でしょ？
頑張ってねー！"
